function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption in the supply chain due to pandemic-related measures","Impact":"Food supply shortage, price instability","Mitigation":"Diversifying sources, ramping up local production, building backup suppliers, developing efficient distribution system","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, logistics optimization technologies","People":"General population, government officials","Owner":"Government, food supply companies"},{"Description":"Global panic buying, food protectionism, and lockdowns","Impact":"Disruption of food supply chains","Mitigation":"International collaboration, diversifying sources, developing efficient distribution systems","Technologies":"Communication technologies, supply chain management systems","People":"General population, government officials","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on neighboring countries for food supply","Impact":"Vulnerability to neighboring countries' policies and restrictions","Mitigation":"Diversifying sources, building backup suppliers, ramping up local production","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, logistics optimization technologies","People":"General population, government officials","Owner":"Government, food supply companies"}]}
